conclusion: Number of turns of the coil: n=100
Side lengths of the coil: l_AB=0.2 m and l_BC=0.5 m
Angular velocity of the coil: ω=100π rad/s

premise: Side lengths of the coil: l_AB=0.2 m and l_BC=0.5 m
conclusion: The area of the coil is A=0.2 m × 0.5 m = 0.1 m²
The maximum induced electromotive force in the coil is given by E_m=nBAω

premise: E_m=nBAω, n=100, B=0.1 T, A=0.1 m², ω=100π rad/s

conclusion: Therefore, the magnitude of the induced electromotive force in the coil is 100π V.
